languages.text: Холодная, ветреная планета покрыта бушующим морем серовато-горчичной травы, достающей до пояса среднему имперцу. Редкие островки мутно-зеленых озер разбавляют бескрайние степи скудным узором, однако авгурная команда еще с орбиты замечает интересную особенность — продольный шрам в несколько десятков километров глубиной взрезает экватор сего мира.

traits.locale_text: Холодная, ветреная планета покрыта бушующим морем серовато-горчичной травы, достающей до пояса среднему имперцу. Редкие островки мутно-зеленых озер разбавляют бескрайние степи скудным узором, однако авгурная команда еще с орбиты замечает интересную особенность — продольный шрам в несколько десятков километров глубиной взрезает экватор сего мира.

languages.text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average human's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.
languages.original_text: Холодная, ветреная планета покрыта бушующим морем серовато-горчичной травы, достающей до пояса среднему имперцу. Редкие островки мутно-зеленых озер разбавляют бескрайние степи скудным узором, однако авгурная команда еще с орбиты замечает интересную особенность — продольный шрам в несколько десятков километров глубиной взрезает экватор сего мира.

traits.locale_text: The chilly and windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's wait. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a running scar several dozen kilometres deep splitting the world's equator in two.

The chilly and windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's wait. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a running scar several dozen kilometres deep splitting the world's equator in two.

This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average human's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

languages.text: 这颗寒风呼啸的行星上，覆盖着肆意生长的芥灰色草海，草的高度能碰到普通人类的腰部。大草原无边无际，单调的颜色偶尔会被一串浑浊的绿色湖泊打破。然而，扫描员却发现了更加有趣的异常现象——这个世界上存在着一条几十公里深的深坑，将赤道一分为二。
languages.original_text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average human's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

traits.locale_text: 这颗寒风呼啸的行星上，覆盖着肆意生长的芥灰色草海，草的高度能碰到普通人类的腰部。大草原无边无际，单调的颜色偶尔会被一串浑浊的绿色湖泊打破。然而，扫描员却发现了更加有趣的异常现象——这个世界上存在着一条几十公里深的深坑，将赤道一分为二。

languages.text: この寒風吹きすさぶ惑星は、平均的な帝国臣民の腰に届くほど背の高いマスタードグレーの草の荒れ狂う海に覆われている。果てしなく続く単調な草原は、濁った緑色の一続きの湖によって所々途切れているが、占術クルーは、それよりもはるかに興味深い異変を発見した。深さ数十キロメートルに及ぶ傷跡が、世界の赤道を真っ二つに裂いているのだ。
languages.original_text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

traits.locale_text: この寒風吹きすさぶ惑星は、平均的な帝国臣民の腰に届くほど背の高いマスタードグレーの草の荒れ狂う海に覆われている。果てしなく続く単調な草原は、濁った緑色の一続きの湖によって所々途切れているが、占術クルーは、それよりもはるかに興味深い異変を発見した。深さ数十キロメートルに及ぶ傷跡が、世界の赤道を真っ二つに裂いているのだ。

languages.text: Este planeta frío y borrascoso está cubierto por un mar embravecido de hierba gris mostaza tan alta que llega a la cintura de un súbdito imperial medio. La monotonía de la interminable estepa se rompe ocasionalmente con cadenas de lagos de un verde sombrío, pero los augures detectan una anomalía mucho más interesante: una grieta de varias docenas de kilómetros de profundidad que divide el ecuador del mundo en dos.
languages.original_text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

traits.locale_text: Este planeta frío y borrascoso está cubierto por un mar embravecido de hierba gris mostaza tan alta que llega a la cintura de un súbdito imperial medio. La monotonía de la interminable estepa se rompe ocasionalmente con cadenas de lagos de un verde sombrío, pero los augures detectan una anomalía mucho más interesante: una grieta de varias docenas de kilómetros de profundidad que divide el ecuador del mundo en dos.

languages.text: Dieser kalte, windige Planet ist von einer tosenden See aus senfgelbem Gras bedeckt, so hoch, dass es bis zur Hüfte eines durchschnittlichen Untertanen des Imperiums reicht. Die Monotonie der endlosen Steppe wird nur gelegentlich von Ketten schlammig-grüner Seen durchbrochen, doch die Auguren-Crew entdeckt eine sehr viel interessantere Anomalie: Eine Narbe, mehrere Dutzend Kilometer tief, die den Äquator der Welt in zwei Hälften teilt.
languages.original_text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

traits.locale_text: Dieser kalte, windige Planet ist von einer tosenden See aus senfgelbem Gras bedeckt, so hoch, dass es bis zur Hüfte eines durchschnittlichen Untertanen des Imperiums reicht. Die Monotonie der endlosen Steppe wird nur gelegentlich von Ketten schlammig-grüner Seen durchbrochen, doch die Auguren-Crew entdeckt eine sehr viel interessantere Anomalie: Eine Narbe, mehrere Dutzend Kilometer tief, die den Äquator der Welt in zwei Hälften teilt.

languages.text: Cette planète froide et battue par les vents est recouverte par une mer démontée d'herbes grises et jaunes si hautes qu'elles arriveraient facilement à la taille d'un sujet moyen de l'Imperium. Si la monotonie de ces steppes infinies est occasionnellement rompue par des chaînes de lacs aux eaux verdâtres, les augures détectent rapidement une anomalie autrement plus intéressante : sur plusieurs dizaines de kilomètres, une balafre scinde l'équateur de la planète en deux parties distinctes.
languages.original_text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average Imperial subject's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.

traits.locale_text: Cette planète froide et battue par les vents est recouverte par une mer démontée d'herbes grises et jaunes si hautes qu'elles arriveraient facilement à la taille d'un sujet moyen de l'Imperium. Si la monotonie de ces steppes infinies est occasionnellement rompue par des chaînes de lacs aux eaux verdâtres, les augures détectent rapidement une anomalie autrement plus intéressante : sur plusieurs dizaines de kilomètres, une balafre scinde l'équateur de la planète en deux parties distinctes.

languages.text: Bu soğuk ve rüzgârlı gezegen; hardal grisi renkteki ve yüksekliği ortalama bir insanın beline ulaşan otlarla dolu, azgın bir denizle kaplı. Uçsuz bucaksız bozkırın monotonluğu, bulanık yeşil göl zincirleriyle yer yer kırılıyor. Ancak alamet mürettebatı, çok daha ilginç bir anomaliyi fark ediyor: Onlarca kilometre derinliğinde olan ve dünyanın ekvatorunu ikiye bölen bir yara izi.
languages.original_text: This cold, windy planet is covered by a raging sea of mustard-grey grass so tall it reaches an average human's waist. The monotony of the endless steppe is occasionally broken by chains of murky green lakes, but the augur crew spots a far more interesting anomaly, a scar, running several dozen kilometres deep, splitting the world's equator in two.
